data.system_settings: iPhone 6s with iOS 11.0.3 & iPad Air 2 with iOS 11.1 PB 5
data.expected_result: The app should change the theme without any problems.
data.short_description: Changing theme with other device crashes app
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you have "Sync across clients." for your appearance activated - Go to any other device than your current one - Open the settings of Discord and then "Appearance" - Change your theme - Now go back to your first device and open Discord
